meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Silva Bill Henner Michael Rankins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #882.

td.p: Steve Silva, an aviation student from San Diego, California
Bill Henner, a commodities trader from Chicago, Illinois
Michael Rankins, a customer service represenative from Rohnert Park, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $22,999)

tr.td: AUTHORS
BALLADS & FOLK SONGS
ENTERTAINING AT HOME
WILL ROGERS
CRUSTACEANS
STARTS WITH "CRU"
